mapper.update: MERGE INTO JOB j USING (SELECT #{code} AS CODE, #{name} AS NAME, #{rankOrder} AS RANK_ORDER FROM dual) t ON (j.CODE = t.CODE) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET j.NAME = t.NAME, j.RANK_ORDER = t.RANK_ORDER WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (CODE, NAME, RANK_ORDER) VALUES (t.CODE, t.NAME, t.RANK_ORDER)
